query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `maintenance_schedules` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`equipmentId` int NOT NULL,
	`maintenanceType` enum('preventive','corrective') NOT NULL,
	`scheduledDate` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`status` enum('scheduled','approved','in_progress','sent_to_purchase','completed','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'scheduled',
	`purchaseRequisitionId` int,
	`createdBy` int NOT NULL,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `maintenance_schedules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`equipmentId` int NOT NULL,
	`maintenanceType` enum('preventive','corrective') NOT NULL,
	`scheduledDate` varchar(10) NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`status` enum('scheduled','approved','in_progress','sent_to_purchase','completed','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'scheduled',
	`purchaseRequisitionId` int,
	`createdBy` int NOT NULL,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `maintenance_schedules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
